https://tmrev.io/movie/570352-Agatha and the Truth of Murder 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c9RzNEpejLkEBVH7cGNekpec8hS.jpg England, December 1926. Although her personal life is in tatters, the famous writer Agatha Christie decides to leave everything behind to help unravel an unsolved murder committed on a train six years ago, unable to imagine the disproportionate consequences that such a selfless act will cause. Agatha and the Truth of Murder
